title: Excellent value, amazing design, upbeat atmosphere, only one con
text:
I stayed here for 12 pleasant nights.The stunning, innovative design appeals to travelers who are curious, casual, and want a central location. Its a novel setting for newcomers who want adventure. Many international travelers provide a refreshing mix of people. One observes many expressions of satisfaction. Essential and interesting amenities, especially access to technology, provide all that travelers need.
Management, staff, are cheerful, helpful and accommodating. Important to know the floor plans of rooms. This hotel really works in a neighborhood rich in eateries and conveniences.
Sterling recommendation for the hotel. Serious drawback Is the restaurant which serves the general public, providing a noisy bar scene and if hotel guests like a really dark " playroom" with hard rock music (noiseometer rating 9). The limited breakfast offers a bagel or a croissant only. The beautiful rooftop terrace also turns into a bar scene from late afternoon and discourages guests from enjoying the stunning views. Pod hotels needs to rethink this so called convenience. I would enjoy my next stay much more if this is changed.
